Surftech Srl

Working as a cybersecurity consultant, leveraging a broad set of technical skills and professional experience gained over years in IT system administration. My background enabled me to communicate effectively across all organizational levels, adapting language and approach to suit each stakeholder.

Focused primarily on:

  • Conducting security audits based on CIS Controls v8.1 and developing tailored improvement plans
  • Acting as project manager during post-audit implementation phases
  • Implementing advanced security measures in areas of deep expertise including Identity & Vulnerability Management, Asset and Software Inventory, and System Hardening & Security Configuration
  • Providing strategic guidance to clients by serving as CISO-as-a-Service, helping define and align cybersecurity initiatives to business objectives and risk profiles

SMI Tech the technical Business Unit of Sanmarco Informatica Spa

Worked as a cybersecurity consultant supporting both clients and internal teams in enhancing their risk management and IT security posture.

  • Applied international methodologies and frameworks to develop long-term improvement plans tailored to organizational goals and available budgets
  • Provided strategic guidance during incident response, especially when infrastructure was externally managed
  • Conducted system and web service vulnerability analyses, helping technical teams interpret reports and prioritize mitigation efforts
  • Specialized in SSL/TLS certificate management and the creation of encryption proxies for data traffic inspection via WAFs
  • Configured email systems and DNS records to defend against email spoofing attacks
  • Frequently engaged in complex investigations requiring deep analysis of system anomalies and application failures

Thron Spa

With the shift from Weebo’s CDN to Amazon Web Services (AWS), the technical challenges and internal requirements for IT management transformed significantly. I embraced this change as an opportunity:

  • Gained hands-on experience with Cloud IaaS architecture
  • Transitioned into a managerial role, shaping and leading IT operations within a cloud-first strategy
  • Adapted infrastructure and services to align with evolving business needs and modern deployment models

Given my strong security-oriented approach, I was chosen to lead the design and execution of the company’s cybersecurity strategy — both in terms of culture and technology:

  • Defined and implemented security policies and protocols across the organization
  • Led company-wide awareness initiatives and established technical defenses
  • Played a key role in shaping secure development practices and governance models

Weebo Srl the Content delivery network of NewVision Spa

Joined the Weebo IT team of a full-fledged Content Delivery Network (CDN) with multiple data centers distributed across Europe — a true technological training ground. This role exposed me to complex and challenging systems, allowing me to deepen my understanding of enterprise infrastructure, networking, and large-scale deployment.

While working with Weebo, I also supported NewVision Spa, which delivered the products powered by the CDN. This position broadened my exposure by collaborating with professionals who were more product-focused, helping me gain a holistic view of technology from infrastructure to end-user delivery.

PadovaStar Spa a Daimler Chrisler authorized dealership

Started my journey in the company as an End-User Help Desk Technician, providing technical support and troubleshooting assistance. Thanks to the company's trust and continuous professional development opportunities, I progressed into the role of a System Administrator specialized in Windows environments.

  • Managed the company's IT infrastructure, including Active Directory, Exchange, security protocols, and backup systems
  • Provided second-level support and proactive system maintenance
  • Collaborated with the technical team to implement scalable and reliable solutions
  • Actively contributed to infrastructure upgrades and data migration projects
